Class BaseResource

java.lang.Object
  org.lafayette.server.resources.BaseResource
Direct Known Subclasses:
IndexResource, ServerResource, UserResource
public abstract class BaseResource
extends Object

Common functionality for all resource classes.

Sven Strittmatter
